pages.text: [another note, dated much later. Some notes in between must have been lost] As I continue adding shards, I can feel the energies in the frame growing. I am not sure where they come from, as there are no power sources nearby. Is it the location?

[yet another note, dated later] The glass is nearing completion. While it often behaves like a normal mirror, there are times I can see glimpses of... something else. What could possibly be on the other side? I must know.
